name: Square shooter (Glitchmaster1709)
description:
Musik by Tobi Fox from Undertale. Check it out!

Square shooter is a short 2D Jump'n'Run, the goal is to kill every enemy is every room to continue. You can choose beween different Weapons, like: Gun, Shotgun, Bounce-gun, Knife (Not a weapon you shoot with, I know but still).
